job.description: Founded in 2015 by neuroscientists and technologists Drs David Eagleman and Yael Katz BrainCheck helps reduce the human and economic toll of cognitive impairment and dementia through its interactive cognitive assessment and care management technology We have traction with over 400 primary care and neurology practices as well as several brandname health systems and payers Our challenges is highly organized and motivated We are committed to providing experiencebased learning multidimensional assignments targeted training and continual coaching and developmentbrbrYour
